General.Name: Hangzhou Cogeneration Group Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Hangzhou Cogeneration Group Co., Ltd. engages in the production of thermoelectricity in China. The company was founded in 1997 and is based in Hangzhou, China. Hangzhou Cogeneration Group Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of Hangzhou Urban Construction Investment Group Co., Ltd.
